_sText:
The map ba_jail_modern_castle has been under production for a while. I'd like to point out that the map does have flaws in it. At its final stages, this was was rushed to a finish. Unforeseen circumstances occurred and caused the map to have a rough landing. 
This map was made for the Outbreak Community (http://outbreak-community.com/)

The map is optimized and should be able to run smoothly on any/most computers.

This map consists of:
Cell Block capable of holding 32 inmates (8x4cells)
"Ant Hills" around the map as "Healing Auras"(Medic)
A well equipped armoury
A large open space for ideas to spark in
Multiple Mini-games wired in
Splendid Scenery
Towers
Find out more when you play it




tl;dr

Map has some flaws/bugs (More visual and do not disrupt gamplay),
Extremely Playable
